text: Donald Sternoff Beyer Jr. (; born June 20, 1950), is an American businessman, diplomat and politician. He is the United States Representative for since 2015. His party's nominee for governor in 1997, he lost to Republican Jim Gilmore, who was then the Attorney General of Virginia. From 2009 to 2013, he was United States Ambassador to Switzerland and Liechtenstein.End of term reflections with U.S. Ambassador Beyer, World Radio Switzerland, May 27, 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Don Beyer official U.S. House site * Don Beyer for Congress * * * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Lieutenant Governors of Virginia Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C.
